metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9158 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libautotrace.a in AutoTrace 0.31.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid write and SEGV), related to the pnm_load_raw function in input-pnm.c:336:11.

notes.Note: msalvatore> The latest version of AutoTrace was released in 2002. Unless this project is forked or adopted by a new maintainer, this vulnerability will likely never be fixed.

criterions.comment: autotrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
